choose.when: insert into board values ( null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), ( select ifnull( max( group_no ), 0 ) + 1 from board a ), 1, 0, #{userNo } )
choose.otherwise: insert into board values ( null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), #{groupNo }, #{orderNo }, #{depth }, #{userNo } )

mapper.select: select no, title, contents, group_no as groupNo, order_no as orderNo, depth, user_no as userNo from board where no = #{no }

choose.when: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by group_no desc, order_no asc limit #{startIndex }, #{size }
choose.otherwise: select a.no, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_no as userNo from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no and (title like '%${keyword }%' or contents like '%${keyword }%') order by group_no desc, order_no asc limit #{startIndex }, #{size }
select count(*) from board where (title like '%${_parameter }%' or contents like '%${_parameter }%')
